name: Unspecific Components of a Logical Pathname
next: Null Strings as Components of a Logical Pathname

sections.type: Unspecific Components of a Logical Pathname
sections.text:
The device component of a logical pathname is always :unspecific; no other
component of a  logical pathname can be :unspecific.

Unspecific Components of a Logical Pathname
...........................................

The device component of a logical pathname is always :unspecific; no other
component of a  logical pathname can be :unspecific.
